DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , assessor-blind , single center , superiority trial conduct . Participants refer clinical psychologist private counseling office ( Senzoku Stress Coping Support Office , Japan ) . Eligible participant woman chronic depression receive psychiatric care . Participants receive schema therapy active monitoring 2 year . Primary outcome treatment response . A total sample size 64 ( 32 group ) would require provide 80 % power 2-sided significance level 5 % detect risk difference 35 % ( response rate : 55 % schema therapy vs. 20 % active monitoring ) , assume dropout rate 10 % .
